Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Class URIUtils

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.URIUtils
public class URIUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains implementation of the useful actions with the URIs.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
JUnit tests

  • Method Details

    • canServeURI

      public static boolean canServeURI​(java.net.URI uri, java.net.URI template) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Does the resource URI can be served by the given URI resource template

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to check
      template - resource template to compare with. Template must be absolute and contains valid scheme and subScheme
      Returns:
      true if can
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument ia null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if template doesn't appropriates with the template constraints

    • loadBytesFromURI

      public static byte[] loadBytesFromURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException

      Load bytes from the given URI.

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to load bytes from
      Returns:
      bytes loaded
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when uri is null
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors

    • loadCharsFromURI

      public static char[] loadCharsFromURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.io.IOException

      Load chars from the given URI.

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to load bytes from
      Returns:
      chars loaded
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when uri is null
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors

    • loadCharsFromURI

      public static char[] loadCharsFromURI​(java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String encoding) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException

      Load chars from the given URI.

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to load bytes from
      encoding - content encoding
      Returns:
      chars loaded
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when uri is null
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • containsNestedURI

      public static boolean containsNestedURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Test that given URI contains nested URI. NEsted URI is any URI in the scheme-specific part, terminated with exclamation mark (!)

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to test
      Returns:
      true if the given uri contains nested URI
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null

    • extractNestedURI

      public static java.net.URI extractNestedURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Extract nested URI from the given URI

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to extract nested URI from
      Returns:
      URI extracted or null if no nested URI inside the given uri instance
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null
      See Also:
      containsNestedURI(URI)

    • extractPathInNestedURI

      public static java.net.URI extractPathInNestedURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Extract path in the nested uri. Path in the nested URI is all path content after last exclamation mark (!)

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to extract path from
      Returns:
      path extracted or null if no nested URI inside the given uri instance
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null
      See Also:
      containsNestedURI(URI)

    • appendRelativePath2URI

      public static java.net.URI appendRelativePath2URI​(java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String relativePath) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Append relative path to path inside URI.

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to append relative path to
      relativePath - path to append
      Returns:
      new resolved uri
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if relative path is null or empty
      LastUpdate:
      0.0.4

    • removeQueryFromURI

      public static java.net.URI removeQueryFromURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Remove query string from URI

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to remove query from
      Returns:
      uri with query removed. If query is missing, returns source uri
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null

    • extractQueryFromURI

      public static java.lang.String extractQueryFromURI​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Extract query string from multi-schemed URI

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to extract query from
      Returns:
      query extracted or null if missing
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when URI is null

    • hasSubScheme

      public static boolean hasSubScheme​(java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String scheme)

      Test weather URI has the given scheme at any depth

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to test
      scheme - scheme to detect
      Returns:
      true if the given scheme presents at any depth, otherwise false

    • extractSubURI

      public static java.net.URI extractSubURI​(java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String... schemas) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.NullPointerException

      Extract sub-scheme content from URI. For example:

      URI uri = URI.create("scheme1:scheme2:scheme3://path");
      extractSubURI(uri,"scheme1","scheme2") returns URI.create("scheme3://path")
      Parameters:
      uri - uri to extract sub-scheme from
      schemas - sequence of schemas to extract content from. Use wildcard '*' for any subscheme to extract
      Returns:
      URI extracted
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if schemas list is empty or contains nulls, or sequence of sub-schemas is missing in the uri
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • parseQuery

      public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> parseQuery​(java.net.URI uri) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Parse query string from uri

      Parameters:
      uri - uri to parse query string
      Returns:
      key/value pair from parsed query. Can be empty but not null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when uri is null
      link - IllegalArgumentException when query contains syntax errors

    • parseQuery

      public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> parseQuery​(java.lang.String query) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Parse query string (usually from uri query)

      Parameters:
      query - query string without preceding '?'
      Returns:
      key/value pair from parsed query. Can be empty but not null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when uri is null
      link - IllegalArgumentException when query contains syntax errors
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • convert2selfURI

      public static java.net.URI convert2selfURI​(byte[] content) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Build 'self' URI from content

      Parameters:
      content - content to build 'self' URI for
      Returns:
      'self' URI built
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when content is null

    • convert2selfURI

      public static java.net.URI convert2selfURI​(char[] content, java.lang.String charSet) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Build 'self' URI from content

      Parameters:
      content - content to build 'self' URI for
      charSet - character set for the content to use
      Returns:
      'self' URI built with '?encoding=ZZZ' query string
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when content is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when encoding is null, empty or unknown

    • deepNormalize

      public static java.net.URI deepNormalize​(java.net.URI source) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Normalize paths in the URI

      Parameters:
      source - source URI to normalize
      Returns:
      uri normalized. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when source URI is null
